title: Tea market : major importing countries worldwide 2018
yAxis: Trade value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Trade value in million U.S. dollars for 15 number of Countrys.
Country Pakistan has the highest Trade value in million U.S. dollars and Canada has the lowest Trade value in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Country Pakistan has 425.78 more Trade value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Canada.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Trade value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Trade value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Country Pakistan and lowest at Country Canada.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Trade value in million U.S. dollars for 15 number of Countrys.
The Trade value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Pakistan and lowest at Country Canada.
The second highest Trade value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Country Russian Federation.
The difference of Trade value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Country is 425.78.
Trade value in million U.S. dollars at Country Pakistan is 571.33 , second place is Russian Federation at 497.07, and thirdly is USA at 487.29.
The Country Pakistan tends to be 2.0 percent higher than average.
